sentences.en: Although he spent a year prospecting for the elusive metal, he met only with failure.
sentences.cn: 尽管他花了一年的功夫去勘探那种很难到手的金属, 却落得个两手空空而归.

sentences.en: And that bottleneck will make type growth rates elusive.
sentences.cn: 而这种瓶颈将让中国式的增长速度显得不可思议.

sentences.en: Eric, as elusive as ever, was nowhere to be found.
sentences.cn: 埃里克总是这样神出鬼没，哪儿也找不着。

sentences.en: Finding a vaccine for Plasmodium has been an elusive goal.
sentences.cn: 寻找防治疟原虫的疫苗,一直是个难于达到的目标.

sentences.en: Happiness, which had been so elusive in Henry's life, still evaded him.
sentences.cn: 亨利生活中过去一直难以捕捉的幸福仍旧与他无缘。

sentences.en: He remained as elusive as ever.
sentences.cn: 他还是那样令人难以捉摸.

sentences.en: He spent a year prospecting for the elusive metal.
sentences.cn: 他花了一年的功夫去勘探那种很难到手的金属.

sentences.en: I've been trying all day to reach him on the telephone, but he's very elusive.
sentences.cn: 我整天都在打电话找他, 但是找不着.

sentences.en: In London late-night taxis are elusive and far from cheap.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦，深夜时难以打到出租车，而且车费非常贵。

sentences.en: It was a vibration merely, faint, elusive, impossible of definition.
sentences.cn: 这不过是一声震颤, 隐隐约约, 难以捉摸, 无法形容.

sentences.en: She enjoys a firm reputation in this country but wider international success has been elusive.
sentences.cn: 她在这个国家享有稳固的声誉，但却一直难以在国际上取得更大的成功。

sentences.en: She managed to get an interview with that elusive man.
sentences.cn: 她设法采访到了那个行踪飘忽的人。

sentences.en: The answers Lord sought were still elusive.
sentences.cn: 洛德寻找的答案仍然显得捉摸不定.

sentences.en: The most elusive knowledge of all is self - knowledge ( Mirra Komarovsky )
sentences.cn: 最令人困惑的知识是 自知之明 ( 米拉科马罗夫斯基 )

sentences.en: The sweet meaty taste, thin and elusive almost as a memory, maddened him.
sentences.cn: 甜蜜蜜的肉味, 跟回忆一样隐隐约约,不可捉摸, 却引得他要发疯.

sentences.en: This elusive planet has much influence over your mind.
sentences.cn: 这颗难懂的行星对你的心智施加了很大的影响.

sentences.en: Try to catch the elusive charm of the original in translation.
sentences.cn: 翻译时设法把握住原文中难以捉摸的风韵.

words.tran_cn: 狡诈；易闪避；飘忽不定；巧妙逃避

trans.tran_cn: 难以捉摸的，不易记住的，逃避的，难以找到的
trans.tran_en: an elusive result is difficult to achieve
